metadata.title: CVE-2021-3246 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A heap buffer overflow vulnerability in msadpcm_decode_block of libsndfile1.0.30 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted WAV file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3246` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.28-7ubuntu0.1
sndfile-programs - 1.0.28-7ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.28-7ubuntu0.1').
